summary: Encapsulates the Fake News Graph Classification dataset, loading directed tree‑structured Twitter propagation graphs and associated node features generated by pretrained language models (BERT, spaCy, profile, content). It manages dataset metadata such as name, class count, graph count, labels, feature tensors and train/validation/test masks, and provides indexed access to individual graph‑label pairs for graph neural network experiments.
business_intent: Provide researchers with a ready‑to‑use, preprocessed dataset interface for developing and evaluating graph‑based fake news detection models in an academic setting.
